about_the_game:
Game Description

A demo of a text-based adventure game with an infinite stream theme of love, with a gameplay time of about half an hour, including one gameover ending and one common ending.

Players will take on the role of a cold hearted and cold-blooded newcomer, Li Zhaoyin, who enters the first snow mountain instance with his boss Xie Yuan and Taoist Yun Qingchen, and learns the truth and makes choices along the way.

Plot introduction

Li Zhaoyin accidentally got caught up in an infinite dungeon on his way to work one day, and woke up to find himself in the midst of a snowy mountain. The cold wind howled, butchers, ghosts, everything was too incredible, and the development of the situation would be up to you.

hot tip

The worldview of this story is different from that of the real world.

Everything that happened in the story is purely fictional, please do not imitate.

The character's values do not represent the author's values.

This work is for entertainment purposes only and has no other meaning.

Players will play as an office worker named Li Zhaoyin, and have a series of love stories with Xie Yuan and Yun Qingchen,They will learn the truth and make choices.
